tool_description: SMS, MMS, Transcoding and User Lookup APIs. Quickly and easily add messaging and rich media to your mobile application with the Mogreet Mobile Services Platform.
name: Mogreet
title: Mogreet

api_list.name: user.lookup
api_list.description: Get information on a phone number

api_list.name: media.list
api_list.description: List all the media you have previously uploaded.

api_list.name: media.get
api_list.description: Lookup a single media object by id.

required_parameters.name: content_id
required_parameters.description: id of a previously uploaded content.

api_list.name: list.download

required_parameters.name: list_id
required_parameters.description: Id of the list to download.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: format of the response (xml by default)

api_list.name: system.ping
api_list.description: Test your credentials and our system status.

api_list.name: list.destroy

required_parameters.name: list_id
required_parameters.description: id of the list to destroy

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: name of the list to destroy (additional security)
